price: Ово је леп спомен! А богобојазне чека дивно пребивалиште,
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
